title: Power Outages Analysis
description: Analyzed patterns and causes of major power outages across the U.S. Developed visualizations and predictive models to improve outage response planning.

title: DNA Transcription and Translation Tool
description: Created a Java tool to transcribe DNA sequences into mRNA and translate them into proteins. Enhanced functionality for biologists and educators with an easy-to-use interface.

title: Dinosaur Species Classification Model
description: Implemented a machine learning model with 85% accuracy during the UCSD Hackathon. Performed data preprocessing, feature engineering, and model optimization.

title: Custom Web Browser Development
description: Built a functional web browser using Python libraries. Implemented page rendering, navigation, and basic browser functionality.

title: Vehicle Simulation Project
description: Simulated vehicle behaviors using object-oriented programming principles. Explored inheritance and polymorphism for efficient code design.

title: Image Processing Tool
description: Developed a Python-based tool to apply image filters and transformations. Utilized libraries like OpenCV for advanced image processing.

title: Sorting Algorithms in Java
description: Implemented popular algorithms like QuickSort and MergeSort. Optimized algorithms for efficient data processing tasks.

title: Tic-Tac-Toe AI
description: Developed an AI-powered Tic-Tac-Toe game using the Minimax algorithm. Created a user-friendly interface to play against the computer.

title: Weather App
description: Created a real-time weather app using Python and APIs. Displayed weather conditions with a clean, user-friendly interface.

title: Flask Blog Application
description: Designed a full-stack blog application using Flask and SQLAlchemy. Implemented user authentication and CRUD functionality.

title: Personal Portfolio Website
description: Developed a personal portfolio website hosted on GitHub Pages. Showcased academic projects, achievements, and skills.

title: Sudoku Solver
description: Created a Python program to solve Sudoku puzzles using backtracking. Integrated a simple graphical interface for user input and visualization.
